body.p: To his Exelency the Govonor of Kentucky

Isaac Paul your Petitioner would Respectfully represent that at the October Term 1858 of the Mercer Circuit Court a Judgment was recovered in the name of the Commonwealth against him for Sixty dollars fine for keeping a Tipling House that Execution has issued for said debt and costs amounting to Eight dollars and five cents that this affiant is a poor man with a family of Eight children to provide for and is actually unable to pay said fine He respectfully prays that executive Clemency may be extended to him and that your Exelency will remit said fine &c

Isaac Paul this day made out by the statements above peition
13 May 1862
We join in the prayer of the above petition

S S McFatridge
O S Poston
Geo. O. Hernden
S. McBrayer
James D Hawkins
A D Haynes
Tho Allen
Ben. C.
Nimrod Harris

Mercer Cir Ct
$60 } Tipling
Issac G Paul
Remission Issd May 26. 1862
